    Megafauna Indicators

    Data files containing megafauna indicators used in the State of the Ecosystem Reports

    aggregate_biomass

    NEFSC survey data broken into season and aggregate group biomass

    blue_runner

    SAFMC managed Blue Runner presence on NES

    energy_density

    Forage fish energy density

    harborporpoise

    Harbor porpoise bycatch

    hp_density

    Harbor porpoise density estimates

    NEAMAP Mid-Atlantic inshore trawl survey

    mass_inshore_survey

    Massachusetts inshore bottom trawl survey

    narw

    North Atlantic right whale abundance

    ne_inshore_survey

    New England inshore state survey data

    nefsc_survey

    NEFSC Bottom Trawl Survey (aggregated)

    nefsc_survey_disaggregated

    NEFSC Bottom Trawl Survey (species-level)

    productivity_anomaly

    Small fish per large fish biomass anomaly

    seabird_mab

    Virginia waterbor productivity

    seabird_ne

    Common tern productivity and diet composition

    species_dist

    Species distribution on the NES.

    species_groupings

    Species groupings

    stock_status

    Managed species stock status

    stom_fullness

    Stomach fullness index calculated from NEFSC fall bottom trawl surveys

    slopewater

    wcr

    Warm core rings spun off of gulf stream

    zoo_oi
